queries.query:
from(bucket: "AGV")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "AGVDATA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "encoder_derecho")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agvid"] == "Sim_1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 200ms, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()

import "experimental"

from(bucket: "Predictions")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 10s, to: now()))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pred")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "encoder_derecho")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 200ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "AGV")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "AGVDATA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "encoder_izquierdo")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agvid"] == "Sim_1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 200ms, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()

import "experimental"

from(bucket: "Predictions")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: experimental.addDuration(d: 10s, to: now()))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pred")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "encoder_izquierdo")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 200ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
